name: Association for the European Citizens' Initiative e.V.
headAddress: Association for the European Citizens' Initiative e.V.
goal: Our organization is primairly working for the successful introduction and implementation of the European Citizens’ Initiative right – the world’s first tool of participatory, transnational and digital democracy but also on other instruments of citizens participation.
euInitiatives: Legal ECI revision process. We are working for the successful introduction and implementation of the European Citizens’ Initiative right and thus strive for a successful revision process of the ECI regulation.
